thoughts.text: I can create a GPT agent to fetch data from an API and return it to you. This will allow you to delegate this task to the agent and focus on other tasks.
thoughts.reasoning: Creating a GPT agent to fetch data from an API and return it to you will help you save time and focus on other tasks.
thoughts.plan: - Create a GPT agent to fetch data from an API and return it to you
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that the agent I create is reliable and efficient in fetching data from the API.
thoughts.speak: I can create a GPT agent to fetch data from an API and return it to you. This will allow you to delegate this task to the agent and focus on other tasks.

args.name: API Data Fetcher
args.task: Fetch data from an API and return it to the user
args.prompt: Please provide the API endpoint and any required parameters.
